body_html:
The selsqrt_grad was quite interesting (unexpected result).

Another interesting case:

import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.InteractiveSession()

s = tf.Variable(0.0)
x = tf.square(tf.square(s))
f = tf.sqrt(x)
init_op = tf.initialize_all_variables()
sess.run(init_op)
dfds, = tf.gradients(f, [s])

dfds==0 analytically but we get a NaN because 0 * Inf = NaN.

body:
The `selsqrt_grad` was quite interesting (unexpected result).

Another interesting case:

```
import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.InteractiveSession()

s = tf.Variable(0.0)
x = tf.square(tf.square(s))
f = tf.sqrt(x)
init_op = tf.initialize_all_variables()
sess.run(init_op)
dfds, = tf.gradients(f, [s])
```

dfds==0 analytically but we get a NaN because 0 \* Inf = NaN.
